official-title.#text:
To amend title IV of the Personal Responsibility and Work
		  Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to restore Medicaid coverage for
		  citizens of the Freely Associated States lawfully residing in the United States
		  under the Compacts of Free Association between the Government of the United
		  States and the Governments of the Federated States of Micronesia, the Republic
		  of the Marshall Islands, and the Republic of Palau.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Restoring Medicaid for Compact of Free
			 Association Migrants Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Medicaid coverage
			 for citizens of Freely Associated States

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the following new
			 subparagraph:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 402(b)(2) of
			 the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996/s:402/ss:b/p:2
Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996/s:402/ss:b/p:3/sp:C
Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996/s:401/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not apply to any individual who lawfully resides in 1 of
				the 50 States or the District of Columbia in accordance with the Compacts of
				Free Association between the Government of the United States and the
				Governments of the Federated States of Micronesia, the Republic of the Marshall
				Islands, and the Republic of Palau and shall not apply, at the option of the
				Governor of Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, the Northern Mariana
				Islands, or American Samoa as communicated to the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996/s:402/ss:b/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
in writing, to any individual who lawfully resides in the respective
				territory in accordance with such
				Compacts.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Secretary of Health and Human
				Services

text.#text:
With
				respect to eligibility for benefits for the designated Federal program defined
				in

header.#text:
Medicaid
				exception for citizens of Freely Associated States

by adding at the
			 end the following new paragraph:

, but only with respect to the designated Federal program defined
				in

section 431(b)(8) of the Personal Responsibility and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996/s:431/ss:b/p:8

text.#text:
The amendments made by this section shall apply to benefits
			 for items and services furnished on or after the date of the enactment of this
			 Act.
